title: Help! How do i make my screen full revolution!
body: I'm having a problem, where my loading and in-game screen is not working properly and i don't know how to fix it... I need help.

replies.body: Turn it 360 degrees, there you go,  problem solved.

When you say revolution:

+ Do you mean your screen is displaying League upside down? 


+ Or do you actually mean **resolution**, where your screen is displaying a poor quality/pixelated image?
Man you stole both of the memes here come on
LEL oh well ty anyways I fixed it now
Actually, maybe send it to a protest and perhaps it may meet others that may want to start a revolution!
